snippet: Which newcomer will shine on the red carpet this awards season?
abstract: Which newcomer will shine on the red carpet this awards season?
lead_paragraph: The writers, producers and art directors all weighed in this week with their nominations. Next week the directors will offer their choices, and the Hollywood Foreign Press Association will even crown some winners. But they are all focused on what's on-screen. What about on the red carpet? The Styles section has some thoughts on who will be Hollywood's next fashionable It Girl. The candidates include the Bagger's pal Felicity Jones ('Like Crazy"), Rooney Mara ("The Girl With the Dragon Tattoo"), Elizabeth Olsen ("Martha Marcy May Marlene") and Shailene Woodley ("The Descendants"). Read more »
